lexUnit.name: sit up.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: move from a lying or slouching to a sitting position

sentence.text: Suddenly he sat up , shaking his head as if to throw off all troublesome thoughts , and managed a smile .
But Toby sat up , pouted and said in an odd , little-girl voice .
As the mourners left , Lydia heard a low laugh and sat up on her rug , thinking suspiciously of her ears .
She was n't aware of Piers approaching until he cast a shadow over her , and she sat up , this time not bothering to wrap her beach-robe around her .
Then he sits up fast , bouncing Keith off .
Joyce sits up in the bed beside me .
` I 'm sorry to interrupt , " they say politely on the phone , and I sit up straighter and always feel guilty .
Tristan sat up .
You sit up ,
He sat up in bed .
` Alexander said I ought to wear these , " she explained , bright-cheeked , as Lisa sat up with a start .
Weir sat up in his chair .
The child sat up .
` She wants to tell us to sit up straight and not to put our fingers on the nice furniture . "
Hari sat up straighter in her chair .
She sat up straight , her eyes once more flashing fire .
I sit up in bed and swing my legs to the floor .
He could n't take his eyes off Zambia 's stomach which was revealed quite plainly as SHe sat up in bed .
I sat up in my chair .
As the teacher looked , Belle opened her eyes and sat up with a radiant smile .
She sat up with difficulty and began to take gulps of air .
Fearon 's eyes opened fully and he sat up with a jerk , swore , rubbed his hand over his black curls and squinted at her .
Hari thrust her worries into the back of her mind and helped her mother to sit up against the pillows .
Folly sat up ; then clutched the sheet to her as she realised with a shock that she was naked .
Caroline sat up .
Colin sat up straight .
He sat up alongside her , but she refused to look at him , refused to let him witness the wet film over her eyes .
He sat up on the bench and pulled on the robe .
Both of them were rather shaken ; Maxim slowed abruptly and sat up straighter in the seat .
